meanings.definition: An account of imaginary or real people and events told for entertainment.
meanings.sent1: I read a fun story about a talking dog.
meanings.sent2: The library has a new storybook about pirates.
meanings.sent3: The story of the dancing cat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a storybook, full of adventures and surprises.
meanings.sent5: The story of the magical forest was enchanting.

meanings.definition: A report of an item of news in a newspaper, magazine, or broadcast.
meanings.sent1: The newspaper published a story about the local election.
meanings.sent2: I heard a story on the radio about a lost kitten being found.
meanings.sent3: The story of the missing sock was front-page news.
meanings.sent4: The story of the storm's destruction spread quickly.
meanings.sent5: The breaking news story shocked the entire town.
